div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 1625 Jerusalem (Temple Mount, outside the E wall), Judaea, 1968 Burial: c. 40 B.C. Contents: 19 AE John Hyrcanus II: (as BMC John Hyrca- nus I 2 [4], 15 [8], 34 [5], 48 [2]) Disposition: Jerusalem (?) Kindler, AHHI III.1 (1968), pp. 1-8, illus. (in Hebrew)
